page.title: 17Moving to the Ladock Valley
page.content:
I have been asking people about their reasons for moving to Cornwall and living in the country. My results look like this:
{- The most important reason was the { peace and quiet. People thought that { the cities they had come from were { too noisy and busy.
- They felt that the country air was healthier and that the pace of life was slower and better for them.
{- They said that it was easier to get { to know people in the country than { it was in the cities.
- They said that the climate was better than farther up the country and that they liked going to the beach and walking in the country.
